short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Crypto currencies converter for crypto currencies, fiat and tokens

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tool to estimate conversions between crypto and fiat currencies. Calculate values between cryptos like Bitcoin, Ethereum, Binance Coin, Chanlink; fiat currencies like US Dollar, Euro, Mexican Peso, Pounds; tokens like SLP, PVU and much more!
